67  def wait_for_state_update(self, name, is_known=False, is_attached=False, timeout=4):
68 
69  start = rospy.get_time()
70  seconds = rospy.get_time()
71 
72  while (seconds - start < timeout) and not rospy.is_shutdown():
73  attached_objects = self.scene.get_attached_objects([name])
74  is_attached_ = len(attached_objects.keys()) > 0
75  is_known_ = name in self.scene.get_known_object_names()
76 
77  if (is_attached == is_attached_) and (is_known == is_known_):
78  return True
79 
80  rospy.sleep(0.1)
81  seconds = rospy.get_time()
82 
83  return False
